topic.title: Content Signing failed
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: __0.6.5___
  * Operating system: __Windows 10___
  * Web browser: ___Vivaldi__
  * Tor status: not available/always/disabled Disabled
  * Opened port: yes/no Yes
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
Everytime I make a ZeroTalk post, it says content signing failed, include too large.
#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. __Login as me___
  2. __Try to post, even on another device___
  3. ___Content Signing failed__

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.
Screenshot: http://i64.tinypic.com/246nfgy.png

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
To post something on ZeroTalk
